channel.title: Kooskia|Idaho County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Kooskia|Idaho County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 - Kooskia
item.description: End Bus. ID-13 West at ID-13 in Kooskia. Turn right for ID-13 east to US-12 jct; left for ID-13 west to (Kooskia) City Center.

item.title: Bus. ID-13 West - Entering Kooskia
item.description: Entering Kooskia on Bus. ID-13 West.

item.title: Bus. ID-13 West To ID-13 - Kooskia
item.description: Bus. ID-13 West To ID-13 in Kooskia.

item.title: End ID-13 North at US-12
item.description: End ID-13 north at US-12. Use US-12 west for Kamiah and Lewiston. Use US-12 east for Missoula (Montana).

item.title: ID-13 South - Nez Perce Trail
item.description: Begin ID-13 south. ID-13 is signed as the Nez Perce Trail and Northwest Passage Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-12 West - Northwest Passage Scenic Byway
item.description: Northwest Passage Scenic Byway (Clearwater Canyon) on US-12 west.

item.title: US-12 West Approaching ID-13
item.description: US-12 west approaching ID-13 south to Stites and Grangeville. Continue west on US-12 for Kamiah and Lewiston.

item.title: US-12 West At ID-13
item.description: US-12 west at ID-13 west in Kooskia.
